20101231024524.000|20101231024525.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20101231024525.000|20101231024525.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with

20101231024527.000|20101231024527.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other

20101231024530.000|20101231024532.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20101231024532.000|20101231024534.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20101231024534.000|20101231024534.000|CC1|            by helping          
20101231024534.000|20101231024535.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20101231024535.000|20101231024535.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20101231024535.000|20101231024538.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20101231024538.000|20101231024538.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20101231024538.000|20101231024541.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20101231024541.000|20101231024541.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20101231024541.000|20101231024543.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20101231024543.000|20101231024543.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20101231024543.000|20101231024545.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20101231024545.000|20101231024545.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20101231024545.000|20101231024547.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20101231024547.000|20101231024548.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20101231024548.000|20101231024548.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20101231024548.000|20101231024551.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20101231024551.000|20101231024551.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20101231024551.000|20101231024552.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20101231024552.000|20101231024554.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20101231024554.000|20101231024554.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20101231024554.000|20101231024556.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20101231024556.000|20101231024556.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20101231024556.000|20101231024558.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20101231024558.000|20101231024558.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20101231024558.000|20101231024600.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101231024600.000|20101231024602.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20101231024602.000|20101231024602.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20101231024602.000|20101231024604.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20101231024604.000|20101231024604.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20101231024604.000|20101231024606.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20101231024606.000|20101231024606.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20101231024606.000|20101231024609.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20101231024609.000|20101231024609.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20101231024609.000|20101231024610.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20101231024610.000|20101231024610.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20101231024610.000|20101231024613.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20101231024613.000|20101231024613.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101231024613.000|20101231024615.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20101231024615.000|20101231024617.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.
